name: s3cli
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: cats1cli(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cs2(c0, c1), c2)

body.origin:
|- wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cword(universe))
-| wceq(cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(cs2(c0, c1), cconcat, cs1(c2)))
-| wcel(cs2(c0, c1), cword(universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cword(universe))
-| wceq(cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(cs2(c0, c1), cconcat, cs1(c2)))
-| wcel(cs2(c0, c1), cword(universe))

body.origin: |- wceq(cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(cs2(c0, c1), cconcat, cs1(c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cword(universe))
-| wcel(cs2(c0, c1), cword(universe))

comment: A length 3 string is a word. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.)
